roleset.name: to give new life or energy to

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Rosen , though , believes [0] imports have reinvigorated the industry in which he has worked for most of his 57 years [*T*].
example.arg: the industry in which he has worked for most of his 57 years

roleset.note: REINVIGORATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reinvigorate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reinvigorate.01-v predicate notes)
